title: Heated Rivalry and Marital Bliss: Two Wives Go Head to Head in a Scary Olympic Sport
summary_full: One represents Belgium and the other Brazil in skeleton, in which the racer slides near-blind down an ice track at well over 80 miles per hour.
summary_public: One represents Belgium and the other Brazil in skeleton, in which the racer slides near-blind down an ice track at well over 80 miles per hour.
